incident_updates.body: Update: 94% of Filerz786 backup has been done.
Update: 86% of Filerz786 backup has been done.
Update: 74% of Filerz786 backup has been done.
Update: 72% of Filerz786 backup has been done.
Update: 65% of Filerz786 backup has been done.
Update: 49% of Filerz786 backup has been done.
Update:24% of Filerz786 backup has been done.
Update: The full back has restarted. 17% of Filerz786 backup has been done.
Update: Due to a technical issue, the full backup has been stopped and it is planned to be relaunched today at midnight. We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.
Update: Filerz786 : 4% of the full backup has been done.
Update : The full back up planned for tonight has failed, our teams will proceed with a re-launch tomorrow morning. Thank you for your understanding.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently doing a fullbackup. We will keep you informed on the evolution of the backup.
Start time : 20/04/2022 13:26 UTC Service impact : Some latency is observed. And some hosted websites may be unreachable. Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently working to solve the problem
Update: The full backup of the filerz172 is completed. Our teams are currently finalizing the restoration. We will inform you when the incident is fully resolved.
Update: 75% of Filerz172 backup have been done.
Update: 64% of Filerz172 backup has been done.
Update: 61% of Filerz172 backup has been done.
Update: 54% of Filerz172 backup has been done.
Update: 39% of Filerz172 backup has been done.
Update: 11% of Filerz172 backup has been done.
Update: Unfortunately, the backup failed. Therefore, it has been rebooted. Since then, 2% of Filerz172 backup has been done.
Update : Filerz172 : 8% of the full backup is completed.
Update : Filerz172 : 1% of the full backup is completed. The backup restarted due to a reboot.
Update : Unfortunately, the back up of Filerz172 has failed. Ongoing Action : The process has been restarted. Thank you for your understanding. Filerz172 : 9% of the full backup has been done.
Update : The backup is still in progress.
Update: Filerz172 : 89% of the full backup has been done.
Update: Filerz196 : The full backup is completed. Filerz172 : 55% of the full backup has been done.
Update: Filerz172 : 55% of the full backup has been done. Filerz196 : 81% of the full backup has been done.
Update: Filerz172 : 48% of the full backup has been done. Filerz196 : 61% of the full backup has been done.
Update: Filerz172 : 38% of the full backup has been done. Filerz196 : 30% of the full backup has been done.

Here is a list of Filerz: 
+ Filerz172: 31% of the full backup is completed. 
+ Filerz196: 12 % of the full backup is completed.  The server had rebooted and the full back up has restarted.
Update : The backup is still in progress.
Ongoing actions: +Filerz172: 09% of the full backup is completed. The server had rebooted and the full back up has restarted. + Filerz196: 73% of the full backup is completed.
Update : The backup is still in progress.
Ongoing actions: Here is a list of Filerz: + Filerz172: 16% of the full backup is completed. + Filerz196: 33% of the full backup is completed.
Ongoing actions: Here is a list of Filerz: + Filerz172: 16% of the full backup is completed. + Filerz196: Due to technical problem, our teams started over the full backup which is now 3 completed.

Ongoing actions: Here is a list of Filerz: + Filerz172: 5% of the full backup is completed. + Filerz196: Due to technical problem, our teams started over the full backup which is now 3 completed. We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.
Update:filerz196 : The fullbackup is actually finished.
Update:filerz172 : A fullbackup is actually in progress. The average duration will be at least fifteen days.

Update: Here is the list of filerz with degraded performance : + filerz172 : A fullbackup operation is in progress + filerz196 : Websites hosted on the filerz may be unavailable. Our technical teams are investigating to know the origin of the degradation
Ongoing actions: Due to a hardware issue, our teams started over the full backup which now is 3% realized. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.
Update: The full backup is still in progress. We will get back to you as soon as it is complete.
Update: 17% of the full backup has been done. We will keep you updated on the evolution of the backup.
Update :50GB out of the 10TB have been transmitted.

Start time : 23/02/2022 14:15 UTC Service impact : Websites slowdown on filerz172 Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : GRA1 Root cause : A full backup is in progress (6% done) Scope of impact : All websites hosted on filerz172 Comment : We will get back to you as soon as the backup is complete.
Update: There are ongoing maintenance tasks that prevent the regeneration of statistics. The regeneration of statistics will normally take place mid-next week.

The regeneration of stats is still on its way.
We will post update when significant progress has been made.
Update: The regeneration of stats is still on going. 38% have been done.
Update:We are restarting the last generation for the rest of customer.
Update : There are ongoing maintenance tasks that prevent the regeneration of statistics. We will come back to you to keep you informed.
Update:Regeneration is currently suspended, blocked at 65%. The generation of the statistics of the day before is still functional however
Update: The daily regeneration is still in progress.
Update: Actually we have 50% generated.
Update:There are 200 sites left to generate to reach 50%.
Update: Our teams will finish generating 50% on the 13/03/2022. We will keep you informed of the progress.
Update:We are starting the last generation for 50% of customer, Actually we have 45% generated.
Update: We are continuing to generate statistics. We will have finished 50% normally end of next week
We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.
Ongoing actions : Statistics generation is still in progress . You will be informed of the progress.
Ongoing actions : Patch have been deployed. We relaunch statistics generation . You will be informed of the progress.
Update :Our technical teams have detected a problem during the regeneration of statistics, we are currently creating a patch to correct the problem.
Update: Our technical teams have detected a bug making the display of the statuses invisible on a date period higher than 1 month. They are investigating to determine the origin

Update: Our teams are working on regenerating the metrics. 30/09/2021 to 11/10/2021 : Metrics regeneration is complete 30/11/2021 to 13/12/2021 : Reconstructed metrics in progress 12/01/2022 to 15/01/2022 : Metrics will be generated shortly. 24/01/2022 to 07/02/2022 : Metrics are curently regenerating

Update: Our teams are working on regenerating the metrics. 30/09/2021 to 11/10/2021 : Metrics regeneration is complete 30/11/2021 to 13/12/2021 : Reconstructed metrics in progress 12/01/2022 to 15/01/2022 : Metrics will be generated shortly.

Update: Our teams are working on regenerating the metrics. 30/09/2021 to 11/10/2021 : Metrics finishes being regenerated during the day 30/11/2021 to 13/12/2021 : Reconstructed metrics started 12/01/2022 to 15/01/2022 : Metrics will be generated shortly.

Update: Our teams are working on regenerating the metrics. 30/10/2021 to 16/11/2021 metrics are re-generated. 30/09/2021 to 11/10/2021 metrics are 50% done. 12/01/2022 to 15/01/2022 and 30/11/2021 to 13/12/2021 metrics will be generated shortly.

Ongoing actions :Following some slowness on the filerz, we had to cancel the regeneration spots. They were relaunched this morning but with a smaller gap in stats to regenerate Next update : 17/01/2022
Ongoing actions : The reconstruction of the statistics takes longer than estimated. 36% of the statistics are rebuilt since last Friday Next update max : 17/01/2022
Ongoing actions : The reconstruction of the statistics takes longer than estimated. Today 25% of the statistics are rebuilt since last Friday Next update : 17/01/2022
Start time : 07/01/2022 Service impact : some statistiques between september and december are missing Ongoing actions : We relaunch all statistics generation, this action can take all week-end
We are continuing to investigate this issue.
Update : Our teams continue to work on resolving the generation of statistics. We apologise for the inconvenience.
Update : We need to wait a few more weeks before restarting the generation and regeneration of statistics.

Start time : 27/04/2022 04:18 UTC Service impact : Statistics are no longer generated from 27 April 2022 Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : GRA2 Scope of impact : All offers on cluster006 are unavailable. Ongoing actions : Due to unscheduled maintenance, we are unable to regenerate the statistics. We will restart this regeneration as soon as this maintenance is completed. Thank you for your understanding.

Start time : 07/06/2022 18:01 UTC End time : 08/06/2022 00:00 UTC Service impact : Creating a new migration won't be possible during the maintenance. Following our continuous improvement policy, out technical teams need to migrate the OVH Mail Migrator tool to an other infrastructure.

Start time : 14/06/2022 05:00 UTC End time : 14/06/2022 07:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement: The aim of this change is to add redundancy (security), having two routers instead of one in case of failure.

The migration of the Cluster024 in GRA1 is completed.
We will resume the migration of the clusters on Monday morning the 30/05/2022.
The migration of the Cluster024 in GRA1 is starting.
The migration of Cluster028 and 029  in GRA1 are completed.
The migration of the Cluster029 in GRA1 is starting.
The migration of the Cluster028 in GRA1 will start shortly.

The migration of the Cluster027 in GRA1 is completed.
We will resume the migration of the clusters on Monday morning the 23/05/2022.
The migration of the Cluster027 in GRA1 is in progress.
The migration of the Cluster026 is completed.

The migration of the Cluster025 in GRA1 is completed.
The migration of the Cluster026 in GRA1 will start shortly.

The migration of the Cluster025 in GRA1 will start shortly.
And the migration of Cluster026 in GRA1 will start today early afternoon.

The migration of the Cluster023 in GRA1 is completed.
Tomorrow morning we will start the migration of Cluster025, and in the afternoon for Cluster026.
The migration of the Cluster023 in GRA1 will start shortly.

The migration of  Cluster020 in GRA1 is completed.
We will soon start the migration of Cluster023 in GRA1

The migration of  Cluster020 in GRA1 will start now.
And the migration of Cluster023 in GRA1 will start today early afternoon.
The migration of Cluster051, Cluster021 and Cluster012 are completed.
Scheduled maintenance is still in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Scheduled maintenance is still in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.
INFO:  The migration of  cluster051(BHS) will start now.

Start time: 09/05/2022 08:27 UTC End time: 17/06/2022 08:27 UTC Service impact: 2 hours of hosting usage statistics won't be displayed in customer manager during the maintenance on a specific cluster. Service improvement: As part of the continuous improvement of our services, we are rolling out a migration of statistics infrastructure on all clusters.
